price: Whoever strives, he only strives for his own good. Indeed, Allah is in no need of the worlds.
arabic: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
